ComicInfo.Title: Retribution: Prologue
ComicInfo.Summary:
At last, the origin of X-O Manowar revealed! How did Aric of Dacia become a slave to the Spider-Aliens? At what terrible cost was the X-O Manowar armor made? And how did Aric come to find himself in the modern day?
Released after X-O Manowar #18, a Gold variant cover exists
Death of Aric of Dacia's parents.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:05:19. [Issue ID 126763]
ComicInfo.Tags: Rolf (Auric's Father,Spider Aliens,The Map-Giver [Elvis Presley],Deidre,X-O Manowar [Aric Dacia] (origin),introduction,Solar,Inga (Auric's Mother,Gafti,Mericus (introduction,death)
